CWEs: CWE-79: Improper Neutralization of Input During Web Page Generation ('Cross-site Scripting')
description: The function unique_name_648 is vulnerable to Cross-site Scripting (XSS) attacks. It directly inserts the 'response_body' into the HTML document without sanitizing it. If 'response_body' contains malicious scripts, they will be executed in the user's browser.
